Ukrainian troops withdraw from Avdiivka as ammunition shortage bitesUkrainian troops withdrew from the devastated eastern town of Avdiivka, Ukraine's new army chief said in the early hours of Saturday, paving the way for Russia's biggest advance since May 2023 when it captured the city of Bakhmut. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 02:11:41 GMT RAHFM3FBWRMZLMUZZOXNY3JXEA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-troops-withdraw-avdiivka-ammunition-shortage-bites-2024-02-17/Yuliia Dysa, Tom Balmforth世界欧洲
UK's Cameron raises Red Sea, human rights issues with Chinese counterpartBritish Foreign Minister David Cameron met his Chinese counterpart Wang Yi at the Munich Security Conference on Friday, the UK Foreign Office said in a statement. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 00:49:41 GMT NOFFWD7OVVIJHGFST65TBF3PEE https://www.reuters.com/world/uks-cameron-raises-red-sea- human-rights-issues-with-chinese-counterpart-2024-02-17/Reuters世界
US urges timely election in Senegal, welcomes court ruling against delayThe United States on Friday welcomed a court decision that overturned the postponement of Senegal's presidential election to December, and called for a new "free and fair election" to be held as soon as possible. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 00:45:18 GMT GUK2KMZFBBKMHDL7O4QSF3KKIA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/us-urges-timely-election-senegal-welcomes-court-ruling-against-delay-2024-02-17/Kanishka Singh世界非洲
Japan successfully launches new H3 rocket after failure last yearJapan's space agency on Saturday successfully launched a second test model of its new flagship rocket H3, in a welcome boost to its space program after last year's inaugural flight failed. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 00:27:43 GMT D26VWSRW2ZIRTHVKXWIFCVSOU4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/japan-launches-h3-rocket-year-after-failed-first-flight-2024-02-17/Kantaro Komiya技术空间
France's Macron opens door to recognising Palestinian stateThe recognition of a Palestinian state is no longer a taboo for France, President Emmanuel Macron said on Friday, suggesting Paris could make the decision if efforts for a two-state solution stalled because of Israeli opposition. Sat, 17 Feb 2024 00:02:47 GMT OKBXZTYQVRNKFE6T5J4R5B5TKU https://www.reuters.com/world/frances-macron-opens-door-recognising-palestinian-state-2024-02-17/Reuters世界
Australian authorities say more Sydney sites tainted with asbestosAustralian authorities said on Saturday asbestos had been discovered in more places in Sydney, including housing estates, as the New South Wales government continued a weeks-long scramble to remove the toxic material from mulch used in public areas. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 23:38:39 GMT U3TCOS2RONOXPCL656R4HKVXSA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-authorities-say-more-sydney-sites-tainted-with-asbestos-2024-02-16/Reuters世界亚太地区
Taylor Swift donates $100,000 to family of slain Kansas City Chiefs fanPop superstar Taylor Swift has donated $100,000 to the family of the woman slain in a shooting near a rally for the Kansas City Chiefs where the singer's boyfriend, tight end Travis Kelce, and his teammates were celebrating their Super Bowl victory. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 22:03:25 GMT LN2ZJ7EEBNKRLER7ULN5FVZI6Q https://www.reuters.com/world/us/taylor-swift-donates-100000-family-slain-kansas-city-chiefs-fan-2024-02-16/Steve Gorman世界美国
Eyeing China, senior US lawmaker vows to back funding for Pacific islandsThe Republican chairman of the U.S. House of Representatives Foreign Affairs Committee said on Friday he supported funding for U.S.-allied Pacific Island nations as a way to counter the influence of China, and would push to include them in any supplemental security aid bill. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 21:45:22 GMT LZC6UGA4OZJATBVUSNCCCWXHLI https://www.reuters.com/world/eyeing-china-senior-us-lawmaker-vows-back-funding-pacific-islands-2024-02-16/Reuters世界
Interpol issues arrest warrants for gunmen in last year Kosovo attackGlobal police agency Interpol has issued international arrest warrants for ethnic Serb gunmen accused of storming a village last year in north of Kosovo and battling police in a shootout, which left four dead, Kosovo's interior minister said on Friday. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 21:28:43 GMT 6LDPMDZIPJLYNBI7CH6R7VUMXQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/interpol-issues-arrest-warrants-gunmen-last-year-kosovo-attack-2024-02-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Navalny's death shocks, but doesn't shift, divided US CongressU.S. lawmakers expressed shock and outrage at the death of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny on Friday, but the news looked unlikely to bridge deep divides over whether the United States should continue its military support for Ukraine. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 20:58:38 GMT VR333PYQUJOTJJHYMCBTN3N3KY https://www.reuters.com/world/navalnys-death-shocks-doesnt-shift-divided-us-congress-2024-02-16/Patricia Zengerle, Makini Brice世界
US, Arab, European ministers meet in Munich to outline post-Gaza ideasSenior U.S., Arab and European officials met in Munich on Friday to discus progress on formulating a plan for post-war Gaza that would be linked to normalizing ties between Israel and Saudi Arabia, officials and diplomats said. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 20:39:28 GMT VDI5Y5JKNZPLDHLXEQPECFTAMM https://www.reuters.com/world/us-arab-european-ministers-meet-munich-outline-post-gaza-ideas-2024-02-16/Humeyra Pamuk, John Irish世界
